title: RE (La, Nd and Yb) doped CeO2 abrasive particles for chemical mechanical polishing of dielectric materials: Experimental and computational analysis
material_removal_rate_mrr: At pH 5: CeO2 800 Å/min; 5% La/CeO2 480 Å/min (-40.5%); 5% Nd/CeO2 398 Å/min (-50.2%); 5% Yb/CeO2 402 Å/min (-47.6%). At pH 9.5: CeO2 280 Å/min; La/CeO2 340 Å/min (+20.9%); Nd/CeO2 365 Å/min (+29.6%); Yb/CeO2 292 Å/min (+4.3%).
equipment_model_calibration_details: Universal-150 CMP machine; ex-situ pad conditioning 30 s
instrument_device_model: XRD D8ADVANCE; TEM JEM-2010F; XPS PHI Quantera II; Zeta Nano ZS90; SurPASS 3; Resmap; Talysurf PGI
particle_morphology: Near-spherical ~20 nm particles with surface-doped RE
surface_functionalization_treatment: Surface doping with 5% La/Nd/Yb via incipient impregnation
